short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the ratings from various websites when you hover a movie on Netflix

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will quickly give you the ratings for a movie when you hover it.
You'll see the ratings from 4 websites ( Imbd, rottenTomatoes, Metacritic, TheMovieDb)
